article: Now more and more people get to know that exercise is important. We  _  need to exercise. Doctors say it is good for us. It makes us  happier  and healthier.  _  who often exercise are more alert . This means they do  _  in exams and schoolwork than those who don't exercise. There are many ways  to exercise  You can walk, run, swim, or play ball games. You have to like  _  you're doing. Try all kinds of things  _  you find one, two, or even three sports that you feel right for you. It's best to exercise twice a week. Thirty minutes each time  _  enough . You can exercise at fitness centres . They have a lot of equipment . The equipment can  _  exercise your arms, legs and other parts of your body  to make  you healthy. Some people buy equipment for their homes, but it is very expensive.
